name: Lucky Bird - Play to Earn Money
name_original: Lucky Bird - Play to Earn Money
description:
Lucky Bird is a fun Arcade game for people of all ages with the ability to earn real money, the rules of the game are very simple 

Fly your bird, avoid obstacles, collect coin and exchange for cash prizes! 

Play as much as you want! 

Play for fun! 

Play for prizes! 

Low payout threshold, withdraw your earned money whenever you want 😊 

Have fun!
